name: Wurmhop
description:
a game where you're a sleepy little baby worm and hop over spikes.

no need for keyboard use, either! the only things you need are a computer and a mouse (and a monitor if you want visuals but that's completely optional)

this game isn't as much of a game as it is a test.

this is my first project i've ever finished, and i know it's still (admittedly more than a little) rough around the edges, but it's definitely not what i want it to be yet. i do plan on updating this and all 80 seconds of enjoyable gameplay it has.

also an android version will get released later on, once i figure some stuff out. :)

UPDATE 1.1.0 CHANGELOG:

  • added little miscellaneous background objects like tombstones, rocks, etc.
  • added snarky comments to the gameover screen
  • added houses. if you touch a house you get a free point!
  • improved title screen
  • added keyboard controls! press up on your keyboard if you don't feel like using the mouse.
  • put more fun™ in the game.
